Sakura and Naruto had unanimously agreed to take Sasuke to naruto's house, so he would not hurt himself.
When they had gotten to his house, sasuke had been acting really weird he couldn't talk and they were sure that he could not use the restroom. They then had no other choice but put him to in diapers. They had stopped at Sakura's to get diapers, since she baby-sat a lot. This is where it gets interesting, "Naruto, I have to go buy more diapers. You think you can keep an eye on Sauske." Sakura said. "Yeah, I guess." came Naruto's reply.
" Okay, ther is one diaper left in the bathroom. Also, there are wipes." Sakura had finally left and Naruto started to play with Sasuke. Sasuke had the mind of a 1 year old at the moment, and was easy to entertain. All was going well until,"What is that smell?" Naruto asked. He searched and noticed that the closer he got to sasuke , the stronger the smell. This meant one thing, Sasuke need a diaper change. 1122122112.content:
Tsundae slowly entered Nauto's house until she caught sight of the crying Sakura. After seeing this, she rushed in, picking up Sakura and hushing her.

"Don't cry, Sakura-chan! Mama's here," she said as she rubbed the crying's girl's back. She sent calming bursts of chakra into Sakura's body, causing the girl to quiet and fall into a deep sleep. Tsunade grinned evilly as she laid Sakura on the carpet. Her plan had worked! The potion she had put into their breakfasts had finally taken effect!

She quickly changed Sakura out of her clothes and into a diaper before going to check on Naruto and Sasuke, who were asleep and dry.

Finally! She could be a mommy! At least until the potion wore off...

Soon, she heard a cry, and rushed to check on...
1122122112.title: Mama Tsundae

112212211221.content:
Sasuke was crying on his back, flailing his arms and legs, whimpering. Naruto wad curled in a ball by the crib, drool trailing down his chin as he snored softly in nothing but his diaper. Tsunade smirked and shook her head. Some things never change...

She carefully stepped over him to get to Sasuke. She carefully pulled him into her arms. His whimpering softened as she carried him to the living room before sitting on his couch.

"Shh, it's okay, Sasu-Chan. Mama has just what you need."

She undid her shirt, releasing her swollen breast. She had been taking hormone supplements to start her milk production, and was happy to see how Sasuke would like it.

"It's supposed to be a little addictive, and it'll get you nice and plump!" she said, rubbing his belly as he suckled. Sasuke giggled, but latched on again, sucking vigorously. Soon, he was done. She burped him, careful of any spit-up.

"Now, let's get your new brother and sister ready and get you to your new home!"

XXX


All of her babies were asleep she took them to the Hokage Tower. She smiled in delight as she laid Sakura on the couch of her office before carrying the boys to their new room. Does Tsunade have another baby boy?

121.content:
Hinata was walking back after successfully comeplting a C-rank mission by herself. As she walked, she stretched her arms out with a long, drawn out sigh from the current work. All of the sudden, two ropes attached to each of her arms, and tie themself around her. As much as she tried to break free, she couldn't get the tight ropes off, nor could she keep them from pulling her into the deep dark woods where she passed out.

A few hours later she finally woke up, but her arms and feet were bound. As she tried to scream, she only let out a muffle as she just realized she had a pacifier in her mouth. Not only that, she was also realized her feet were tied together and she was wearing a straight jacket, and she was in a crib.What shocked her most though, was the diaper around her waist. As she kept screaming, she heard a door open.

"Hello, baby Hinata..." Said a voice from behind her. When the voice revealed who it was, Hinata went shocked as she saw it was...

1213.content:
"Aw doesn't baby Hinata look so cute." as she tickled Hinata's tummy lightly.
Hinata was so confused. What was her former teacher doing here? She'd retired and left the Leaf with Asuma ages ago. There was no way Kurenai could've kidnapped her, right?
Kurenai smiled at her "I missed you sweetheart. I told you not to run yourself dry and what do I find? You've been taking mission after mission and all on your own too. So I decided because your not mature enough to take care of your own health I'll take care of it for you..."
Kurenai picked her up from the crib as if she weighed nothing and rocked her gently after seeing Hinata's distressed face.
"As I could never hurt my precious baby Asuma will be doing the disciplining for me when you are naughty. We told Tsunade we'd take you in for an indefinite holiday so we can have all the time we want. I will make sure you have the childhood you never had. You call me Mama and Asuma Papa."
Kurenai then brought her to a rocking chair in the corner of the nursery. She then took off her shirt showing off her breasts and took out Hinata's pacifier but before Hinata could speak her mouth was pushed towards Kurenai's breast. Hinata involuntarily began to suck and was surprised by the actual taste of Kurenai's milk. It tasted nice, but there was something else to it.
Once Hinata had relaxed Kurenai admitted "Precious the jutsu I used to make me breastfeed makes you loose motary and chakra control. It is also quite addictive."
Hinata tried to move her head away but Kurenai put it back in place. Kurenai looked down guiltily at the betrayed face of her former student.
"This is the only way I could think of that you wouldn't hurt yourself that doesn't have long-term effects besides getting a bit on the chubby side because you wont be exercising. We'll ween you off it when I think your ready to be a big girl."
Slowly Hinata began to fall asleep. She knew her teacher- no her Mama only wanted the best for her. She felt safe in her arms and her last thoughts before drifting to sleep was 'this might end up a nice holiday'.
1213.title: Kurenai

12131.content:
Some later, Hinata awoke to a strange feeling surrounding her crouch and butt. She couldn't name it, but she didn't like it. She tried to scratch it, but found that her hands couldn't reach it. She didn't feel right...she felt messy and uncoordinated. Without knowing what to do, she began to cry, first just sniffling before crying loudly. Before long, a light came on, and she opened her eyes to find Kurenai above her.

"Did my little girl have an accident? Here, let me help."

She once again picked up as if she was nothing. The next thing she knew she was on something soft, her legs held above her as something cold wiped against her private areas. But then she felt clean, especially after a new, clean diaper was put on. She was still sniffling when Kurenai picked her back up and brought her to the rocking chair, where she positioned Hinata in her lap and undid her shirt.

"Is Hina-chan hungry?" She pushed Hinata against her breast until Hinata, somewhat reluctantly, took the nipple in her mouth and suckled.

"Good girl! Just a little bit longer and Mommy won't even have to ask!"

Hinata, however, was barely listening. The milk tasted even better than last time! She half closed her eyes as she suckled. Kurenai soothingly caressed her hair. Hinata didn't stop sucking until the milk was, sadly, all gone.

What happens now!

122.content:
“Let me get this right,” asked Tsunade as she look at Sasuke, Naruto and Suigetsu. She knew she should never had aloud Sasuke and his team into the village but Naruto would not let it drop and kept bugging her till she could only say all right but it was up to him to watch them.

Now in less then a week something had happened.

“You three were eating at the Ichiraku Ramen bar. When Karin walk up and tried to hit on Sasuke. Am I right so far?” asked Tsunade. The boys only nodded there heads in agreement. “ After a few minutes of this Sakura pass by and saw Karin all over Sasuke. She took a seat on the other side of Sasuke and started a fight with her. Yes?” Once again the boys only nodded. “ So what happen after that,” ask Tsunade as she leaned back in her seat. Both Naruto and Suigetsu pushed Sasuke forward. Sasuke shot both of them a quick glare before looking back at Tsunade.

“Well,” Sasuke said as he cleared his throat. “ After yelling at each other about how the other one was weak, useless and ugly, they started to tug on me asking which one was better.” Taking a deep breath Sasuke continued . “ With that my anger got the better of me and I cast Tsukuyomi on them .” When Sasuke finished Tsunade turned to look at both girls. Both of them were in the corner and by all means look like they were only asleep. “ What did you do to them Uchiha” Tsunade said trying very hard not to kill the boy. “Um see as they were acting like brats. I sort of hypnosis them into thinking they were nothing more then babies”

“What!!” shouted Tsunade slamming her fist on to her desk which made cracks form around it. Naruto stepped forward and quickly said “but we don't know if it has worked. He could have failed and just made them go to sleep for a bit.” Tsunade begin to say something but she heard someone moving. All four of them look at the girls. They were starting to wake up.
122.title: Baby Genjutsu

choices: For Choji and Shikamaru to babysit her until she gets better
For Ino to go back home to be taken care of
For Ino to go with Tsunade for something to cure her
123.content:
The Ino-Shika-Cho trio had completed yet another mission for the Village Hidden in Leaves.

"Honestly, that could have gone better," said Ino.

"Ah, quit complaining," said Shikamaru, "It's such a pain," Choji said nothing, as he stuffed his face full of chips.

"If you hadn't fallen asleep and Choji wasn't stuffing his face, that prince wouldn't have been chewing me out about the star that got stuck in his butt," said Ino, not seeing the tree branch above her was weakening until...

BONK!!!

"Ino!!!" shouted Choji and Shikamaru, the branch having struck Ino hard on the head. The two ninja went to reviving their teammate, applying ice to her bump and gently trying to nudge her awake. When her eyes opened, something odd came out of Ino's mouth.

"Gawooo..." said Ino, before she began sucking on her thumb.
**************************************************************************** **********************
"So you're saying after Ino got her head hit by a branch, she started acting like this?" asked Tsunade, the Hokage to the village.

"Yeah," said Shikamaru, as Ino sat on the ground, playing with her toes and looking around with big childish eyes.

"Piggy!!!" went Ino, squeeling.

"What...?!!!" began Choji, eyes flaring up.

"Calm down, Choji! I think she means Ton-Ton!" shouted a scared Shikamaru, pointing to Schizune's pig.

"Oink..." went Ton-Ton as Ino squeezed him tightly.

"It could be the bump has caused her to mentally regress like a baby," said Tsunade, before Ino tugged on Choji's shirt.

"Hungwee..." went Ino, finger in her mouth. "Feed me..."

"I think she wants your chips," said Shikamaru.

"Ok, but just a few..." sighed Choji, before Ino grabbed the whole bag and began eating all messily. "I SAID JUST A..."

"WAHHHHHHHH!!!" cried Ino, before Choji froze. She inadvertly had used her clan's paralysis jutsu on him.

"Seems her appetite has grown too," said Schizune, as Ino only calmed after Shikamaru fed her the whole bag.

Tsunade then suggests...
123.title: A Bump to the Head

choices: Schizune tries to calm down Tsunade (Only after she gives her candy)
Schizune takes Tsunade back to the village...noticing Tsunade is getting heavier
ANBU arrive and figure out what's wrong
1251.content:
"Finally...I have you at last, Orochimaru!!!" shouted Tsunade, finally cornering the villianous traitor.

"Heh, heh, heh...so the dear 5th Hokage delights with her presence?" asked Orochimaru, as the snakey ninja waved his hands behind his back stealthly. Tsunade did not see a pair of snakes emerging from the ground. "Leaf Village is in such disarray...what would happen if you suddenly stop giving the right commands?"

CHOMP!!!

CHOMP!!!

"AHHHHHHH!!!" screamed Tsunade, a snake biting each arm. "These....!!!"

"The dreaded Childhood Snakes...quite a deadly breed we ninjas created, isn't it?" asked Orochimaru, before Tsunade passed out.
**************************************************************************** ******************************************************
Schizune soon arrived after Orochimaru left, and she found her lady on the ground.

"Tsunade-sama!!!" shouted Schizune, working to revive her lady. She quickly noticed the snake bites and tried to indentify. "This is odd...I never seen..." she began, before Tsunade woke up. "Tsunade-sama?"

To Schizune's shock, Tsunade's eyes teared and she cried, "Mean snakes bit me!!!"
1251.title: Snake Bites

choices: Tsunade wets herself, leading her to wear diapers
Schizune eats to get rid the stress Tsunade caused
12512.content:
Schizune chose to ignore the strange comment from Tsunade, and began to walk back to the village.

"Shizune, don't tell anyone about the mean snakes thing, okay?" Tsunade asked abruptly.

"Yes Hokage." Schizune said, glad Tsunade seemed to be out of...whatever that was..."

As the walked, Tsunade got a strange feeling, nothing intolerable but, just, something. What neither of them noticed is that Tsunade was actually gaining about an ounce with every step. Slowly but surly, her weight slowly went up, by the time she was halfway back to the village, she had gained 25 pounds, her outfit was rather louse fitting, so she didn't notice.

"Schizune, did we take the wrong path? My legs are starting to get tired..."

"Uh, no...this is the same path."

Tsunade turned around to look at Schizune, to Shizune, Tsunade look slightly more plump than usual... Her belly was beginning to push out on her belt, her thighs were looking a bit more plump, her arms had gained some, but was not visible due to her coat. Her face had also rounded out a bit.

"Schizune, why are you looking at me like that?" Tsunade asked, wondering why Schizune was giver her a funny look.

Schizune wanted to say something, but she decided not to. "It's probably nothing, and if it isnt, it might just be the vennom making her swell, Orochimaru would do somthing like that." She thought to herself as she passed it off as nothing and continued to walk with Tsunade.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
When they were almost back to the Village, Tsunade's weight gain has shot up to 100 pounds heavier. She was about 204 pounds. She was fat. Not like Schizune or Tsunade herself could see that. Her pace had been reduced to a slight waddle.

Schizuneeeeee, I'm tiiiiiierd.....

Schizune was just ignoring her, tired of the constant complaining.

Tsunade had taken off her jacket, and the bands around her stomach. Her now fatty body showing to all who could see. Her belly seemed to hold the most weight, pushing out half a foot and peaking out slightly under her shirt. Her butt and thighs had gained a considerable amount as well. Her thighs were at least 50 inches in circumference. She had a slight second chin, and fatty cheeks. Her breasts had gone up to a good D-cup. Her arms had also fattened up as well.

They walked back to the village, ignoring the funny looks they get, they head back to the Hokages building. Tsunade's gain seems to be speed up, already gaining another 50 pounds.
12512.title: Schizune takes Tsunade back to the village...no...

Here are two things to keep in mind when you add a chapter.

- Remember to keep the storyline constant... watch the details.

- Try not to let the story end
